product_description: Creativity is one of the core assets of your organization. With ClickShare, you can make sure ideas receive the attention they deserve. This wireless presentation system allows users to simply share what’s on their laptop or mobile device, on the presentation screen. No cables, no set-up, no waiting to join in. Plug in to stand out The CSE-200 offers the ClickShare experience for small and medium-sized meeting rooms. Anyone – including guests – can connect with one click and share right away, without the need for any training. Users simply plug a USB-powered device – the ClickShare Button – into their PC or Mac and click the button to get the content from their laptop on the large meeting room screen. With the ClickShare App, users can also share content from their mobile phones or tablets. Encouraging collaboration The CSE-200 was designed for enterprise rollouts and offers enhanced security features, a wider range of connectivity options – including AirPlay support – and central management. Allowing up to 2 persons to share content simultaneously, the CSE-200 ensures direct connectivity to the central screen and encourages collaboration. For user convenience, security features of the CSE-200 can be set to one of three predefined levels, depending on the company’s policies and needs. Last but not least, the device’s API also makes integration into the company network a lot easier.

name: Lemorele G500 Expandable 8-in-1 Wireless HDMI Presentation System for Conference Rooms, 1080P 60Hz, 5.8GHz, 165ft Range, Low Latency (1TX+1RX Starter Kit with Charging Dock Included)
short_description: Scalable 8-to-1 Wireless System for Multi-Presenter Meetings: Start with the 1 Transmitter (TX) & 1 Receiver (RX) Starter Kit. The system is designed to scale, allowing you to connect up to 8 individual G500 TX units to a single RX, making it the ideal cable-free solution for collaborative meetings, classrooms, or training rooms

Dedicated 5.8GHz Band for Stable, Professional Performance: Engineered for critical business environments, it operates on a dedicated 5.8GHz wireless band. This minimizes interference from common WiFi networks, ensuring a robust and reliable connection for glitch-free presentations, even in dense office settings

Full HD, Low-Latency Wireless HDMI with Long Range: Transmits high-definition video and audio up to 50m (165ft) in open space. Enjoy crystal-clear 1080P resolution at 60Hz with a low latency of under 50ms, guaranteeing smooth cursor movement and video playback without noticeable lag

Truly Plug-and-Play with One-Touch Switching: No drivers, apps, or network setup needed. Simply connect the RX to the display and plug the TX into your laptop's HDMI port. Mirror your screen in under 3 seconds and switch seamlessly between presenters with a single button press on any TX

Long-Lasting Portable TX with Organized Charging Dock: Each Transmitter (TX) features a built-in 2000mAh rechargeable battery, providing up to 4 hours of cord-free presentation time. The included dock uses magnetic connectors to securely store and simultaneously charge 1 TX and 1 RX, keeping your system organized and always ready for the next meeting

short_description: Plug-and-Play, 4K Decoding: The wireless HDMI transmitter and receiver require no WiFi, Bluetooth, or apps—simply plug in and set up within 10 seconds to eliminate messy cables. Supporting 4K decoding, 1080P output, and a 60Hz high refresh rate, it delivers clear, stable images with perfectly synchronized audio. Ideal for meetings, classrooms, family gatherings, gaming, and more—enjoy crystal-clear viewing on a bigger screen

Long-Distance Transmission with 2.4G+5G Dual Band: hdmi transmitter and receiver supports wireless transmission up to 98 feet, featuring a built-in 2.4G+5G dual-band chip and LDS antenna for strong anti-interference and stable signal performanc. Even through walls or obstacles, it maintains a reliable connection. With ultra-low latency (as low as <0.01s), it ensures seamless video streaming—perfect for learning, meetings, family gatherings, gaming, and more

Note: Requires Type-C to HDMI transmission capabilit. Please confirm that your phone or tablet supports video output

Extended + Mirroring + Privacy Mode: The hdmi wireless transmitter and receiver support multiple display modes, including Extended Mode, allowing users to expand their workspace for greater productivity, and Mirroring Mode, which projects content from laptops, cameras, or TV boxes onto HDTVs, projectors, or monitors. It also features a Privacy Mode — simply press the function button to instantly disconnect or reconnect the screen, ensuring security and flexibility. Perfect for meetings, offices, classrooms, and other professional scenarios

HDMI Transmitter and Receiver Kit: The hdmi wireless transmitter and receiver kit comes fully equipped with a USB-C to HDMI 4K adapter, Micro HDMI 8K adapter, and Mini HDMI 8K adapter, supporting both wireless HDMI and USB-C wireless connections for maximum flexibility across various devices and usage scenarios. Additionally, the kit features an LED digital display, providing real-time, clear indicators of connection status and power levels—making troubleshooting faster and operation more convenient

Important Notes: When using the Wireless HDMI Transmitter and Receiver, please note: If the connection becomes unstable or your computer lacks sufficient power to support HD functions, connect the transmitter to an adapter or micro power interface (5V/2A) to ensure adequate power supply. In addition, transmission distance and speed may be affected when the signal passes through walls or obstacles. If you encounter any issues during use, please contact our professional technical support team for assistance

short_description: 【SCREEN MIRRORING VIDEO/AUDIO to BIG SCREEN】 wireless hmdi transmitter and receiver supports video resolution up to 4K@30Hz resolutions 1080P full HD/720P,Built-in chip can prevent delay and lag caused by signal interference, you can enjoy clear and vivid images in a large screen. This Mirroring Dongle is perfect for learning, business meeting, family party and playing games and gives you a great screen experience.

Make this kit perfectly compatible with your commonly used machines and also compatible with more products.

【PLUG & PLAY】hdmi wireless transmitter and receiver No drive or APP needed, without messy wires, it’s easy to connect and pair TV and will not affect other wireless devices,Wirelessly mirror and share all contents on the big screen,include: pictures,videos,online game,online movies,web browsing,online shopping,documents and more.

【POWERFUL FUNCTION】HDMI Wireless adapters support stream HD 4K@30Hz 3D movies,TV shows, video, games, presentations wirelessly from your Laptop,PC,Mac,Smartphone,Satellite Box,HDSLR Camera to HDTV,Projector or Monitor.

【50M/165FT LONG RANGE TRANSMISSION】The hdmi sender and receiver wireless allow for stable signal transmission at a distance of up to 165FT/50M by utilizing an updated wireless frequency band with multiple channels.This ensures that you won't experience signal interruptions even at long distances. This means you don't have to buy a long HDMI cable to extend video signals.NOTE:If in different rooms, or on different floors, where the rooms are separated by cement walls, the signal transmission may be affected,and the transmission distance may be reduced to 3-5Meters.The extent of the impact will depend on the thickness of the cement walls.Therefore,this distance is only for reference.

【WIDE COMPATIBILITY】These wireless hdmi sender and receiver are lightweight and easy to carry for outdoor business presentation. Compatible with most HDMI output devices,laptop,PC,Blu-ray Player,Camera,DVD,DSLR,Set-top boxes,Cable/Satellite boxes, tablet and more.Suitable for conference rooms,home entertainment and multimedia education.

【NOTE】wireless hdmi separator When using this device, please connect the receiver and transmitter to a charger with a power of 5V1A or above. If a charger is not used,the following two situations may cause interruption or lag during the use of the device.

1.During the use of the "transmitter", when the battery of the computer is low, some computers may have low HDMI input current, causing the power light of the transmitter to become weak or extinguished, which may lead to interruptions or stuttering during the use of the transmitter and receiver. 2.During the use of the "receiver", if the USB interface power provided by the TV is less than 5V1A, it may cause interruptions or stuttering during the use of the transmitter and receiver.

【THE WIRELESS KIT INCLUDES】 wireless HDMI receiver*1, wireless HDMI transmitters*1, C-type charging cables*2, HDMI cable*1, and a manual(no "5V/2A charger"). （To match 8 transmitters, additional transmitters need to be purchased. You can search for ASIN: B09N8Y5283 to purchase.） A receiver can match up to 8 transmitters. Allow you to freely switch computer devices during work or meetings, making your work more convenient.

【 More Expansion Interfaces 】 This package comes with an additional set of mini HDMI adapters and USB-C HDMI extension cables. It ensures seamless compatibility with your commonly used devices and various small tools without HDMI ports, suitable for Sony, Canon cameras, Apple laptops, etc
